Text: Thanks HighCode. This one must have some fast moving action. You usually don't rev up the video KBps quite this high.

Yes, very fast moving camera and lots of very dark scenes. Poor filming by the way as if amateur filmed it, lots of cuts...
I personally hate shaking-filming, it makes me headache lol.

Those who saw "Ong Bak Trilogy 2003-2010 BDRip 1080p DTS Tha Hun- HighCode " will agree that all 3 were very professionally filmed, you could see each movement in each fighting clearly.
